events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has now been categorised under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out to coordinate next steps shortly.
Your profile was reviewed during the initial screening. The technical fit looks promising and we would like to move forward.
Thank you for your prompt response. We appreciate your enthusiasm and willingness to proceed with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC. Please prepare for questions on software architecture and coding.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software development principles.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC. This will cover company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your alignment with our company values.
We have officially extended you an offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review the terms and respond at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear that the terms meet your expectations.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We look forward to having you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun. You will receive access to all the necessary tools and resources to get started.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard, and we are excited about your contributions to the software engineering team.
